originalText.text:
Great in and out spa! Got a relaxing and much needed massage by Monica! My back was killing me and she made it feel so much better. This spa is clean and modern. All the ladies here are so friendly.

Find more info at #spawithamanda

originalText.text: Highly recommend this spa if youâ€™re looking for relaxation and rejuvenation. I came here with my partner and we got a pedicure and we got the spa escape package which included a facial and a massage. The service was absolutely outstanding - we were greeted with friendly staff and complimentary champagne. The massage was phenomenal - the ambience and the relaxing music really helped unwind. The masseuse was very receptive and attentive - my partner had a tight muscle in his back and she really helped relieve the pain. The facial left me with plump and glowing skin and the facialist even recommended products that would work best for my skin type. We left feeling super relaxed, refreshed and glowing. All in all, exceptional staff and service, definitely sign up for their services!

originalText.text:
I try to do a spa day every year on or around my birthday. I had a go to spot for a few years and unfortunately they closed their midtown location recently. I had to find a new place and after much searching in the same area, I found Allure. While a bit pricier than my old spot, the 90 minutes deep tissue massage was amazing and much needed! Worth it!
As a new customer, their online booking system was easy to use, I booked probably with 1-2 days notice. I didn't have a preference to who my masseuse should be, I took whoever was available, I got Cristina who was wonderful and attentive to areas I needed more work on.
After my long massage, I was offered champagne (or if you'd prefer mimosa, coffee, tea or water) and relaxed in their common space for a bit before getting ready to leave. The space is utilized well and definitely has a good relaxing spa atmosphere. I now receive emails with discount deals and offers which I always look forward to and plan to pay another visit here soon. ðŸ™Œ

(See Photos section for pictures)

originalText.text: Amazing service, came for a galentines date. We were greeted with champagne before and after our wonderful massages. Highly recommend getting the reflexology added on! Definitely will be returning!!:)

text.text: Amazing service, came for a galentines date. We were greeted with champagne before and after our wonderful massages. Highly recommend getting the reflexology added on! Definitely will be returning!!:)

originalText.text: A quick google search led us to the most amazing spa experience ever! From the moment we walked down the stairs we were pampered and treated as if we were the most important people in the world.  The massage and facials were heavenly and my mother's manicure was fantastic.  We can't wait to come back to New York and plan a full day with everything there is to offer here!
